# The `UnloopUpdater` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Find the new parent loop for all blocks within the &quot;unloop&quot; whose last backedges has just been removed. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Find the new parent loop for all blocks within the &quot;unloop&quot; whose last backedges has just been removed.

Definition at line 693 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.

## Protected Member Functions

### getNearestLoop() {#a764281a8361495e92ef18a100019c9ec}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Loop &#42; UnloopUpdater::getNearestLoop (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/basicblock">BasicBlock</a> &#42; BB, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/loop">Loop</a> &#42; BBLoop)</>}
  labels = {["protected"]}>
Return the nearest parent loop among this block&#39;s successors.

If a successor is a subloop header, consider its parent to be the nearest parent of the subloop&#39;s exits.

For subloop blocks, simply update SubloopParents and return NULL.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp/#l00719">719</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/loopinfo-cpp">LoopInfo.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
